attributes.action: Call for resignation of the Home Secretary.
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, call for the resignation of the Home Secretary, for dereliction of duty to the UK.
Recent events illustrate that our safety, culture, and way of life, have been put at risk: policy is dictated by unelected establishments outside of the UK, and the Home Secretary's actions over the period she has been in post show that she is not prepared to say, 'No' and put the UK and its people first.We require that securing our borders, and knowing who is going in and out of the UK is made an urgent prority for action.
